name: The Best Cirno Day
description:
HAPPY CIRNO DAY!

Follow Cirno on her best day ever! Game features:

  • It's so quick to finish you could swear it was Cirno's flight speed.
  • Plenty of hilarious Touhou moments, all of which featuring Cirno
  • Memes?
  • Real kneeslappers
  • This is basically just a quick little Cirno game that's all there is to it ok

Made in 4 hours specifically for Cirno Day, I hope you enjoy! :)
